results.abstract: J Lederer apptd safety dir of NASA Manned Space Flight Office
results.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 1 (AP) The National Aeronautics and Space Administration appointed Jerome Lederer, a leading authoriy on aviation safety, to a new post as head of its astronaut safety activity today.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 1 (AP) The National Aeronautics and Space Administration appointed Jerome Lederer, a leading authoriy on aviation safety, to a new post as head of its astronaut safety activity today.

results.abstract: H W Waters article on soldier dolls and other 'war' toys, many inspired by Vietnam war; illus; psychiatrists comment on effects on children

headline.main: Dolls at War; Dolls at War (Cont.)

results.snippet: SOMEWHERE over Vietnam "G.I. Joe Action  Pilot" (Hasbro Toys) is on a bombing mission in his 1/72-scale AI-E Skyraider (Monogram Models), loaded with two Plastic napaim pods. Suddenly he is intercepted by a squadron of Russian MIG .79's (Aurora...
results.lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE over Vietnam "G.I. Joe Action Pilot" (Hasbro Toys) is on a bombing mission in his 1/72-scale AI-E Skyraider (Monogram Models), loaded with two Plastic napaim pods. Suddenly he is intercepted by a squadron of Russian MIG .79's (Aurora Plastics Corpo- ration). "Enemy fighters 12 o'clock high!" squawks the tiny electronic tape in G.I.

headline.main: Astronaut Killed in an Auto Crash

results.snippet: PEARLAND, Tex., June 6 (UPI)--One of the nation's newest astronauts, Maj. Edward G. Givens Jr., of the United States Air Force, was killed today when he missed a sharp left-hand curve in this little town near the manned spacecraft center and crashed...
results.lead_paragraph: PEARLAND, Tex., June 6 (UPI)--One of the nation's newest astronauts, Maj. Edward G. Givens Jr., of the United States Air Force, was killed today when he missed a sharp left-hand curve in this little town near the manned spacecraft center and crashed his car off the road.

results.abstract: Named Pres Johnson physical fitness aide; por
results.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 6 (AP)--President Johnson today named Navy Capt. James A. Lovell Jr., who has logged more hours in space than any other person, as his special consultant for physical fitness.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 6 (AP)--President Johnson today named Navy Capt. James A. Lovell Jr., who has logged more hours in space than any other person, as his special consultant for physical fitness.

results.abstract: printing method for producing NASA 9th anniv twin commem discussed
results.snippet: THE United States will issue a unique set of postage stamps on September 29, when twin adhesives will commemorate American efforts in space. A single horizontal design, depicting an astronaut during a space walk, will spread over the width of two...
results.lead_paragraph: THE United States will issue a unique set of postage stamps on September 29, when twin adhesives will commemorate American efforts in space. A single horizontal design, depicting an astronaut during a space walk, will spread over the width of two normal size stamps.

headline.main: The Proceedings In Washington; THE PRESIDENT

results.snippet: Spoke to 3,000 delegates to an A.F.L.-C.I.O. building trades convention; saw astronaut James Lovell, new special consultant on physical fitness; saw Robert Good, United States Ambassador to Zambia; nominated James P. Grant to head the Agency for...
results.lead_paragraph: Spoke to 3,000 delegates to an A.F.L.-C.I.O. building trades convention; saw astronaut James Lovell, new special consultant on physical fitness; saw Robert Good, United States Ambassador to Zambia; nominated James P. Grant to head the Agency for International Development's Vietnam programs; saw Lieut. Gen. Lewis W. Walt, former Marine Corps commander in Vietnam.
